channel.title: [PI] Objects - Adding Options/Actions?
channel.description: So ive spawned an object its in the objectmanager.java etc.. However it has no optons. Just Examine. I just want know how to add say an option of 'pickup' intructions please! Be semi specific as well client or server sided? or both?

item.title: [PI] Objects - Adding Options/Actions?
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:6, topic:413535”]…
ObjectDef.class

if (i == objectID) { objectDef.name = "ObjectName"; }[/quote]

Yeah tried doing that got an error everytime I tried to put "objectDef.actions[0] = “Take”;

Read full topic
